item.title: Upgrade from v1 to v2
item.description: Dkron v2 brings lots of changes to the previous version. To successfully upgrade from v1 to v2 you need to take care of certain changes: Migrating Jobs To migrate jobs from v1 to v2, export jobs from the v1 cluster and import them into v2.
